    • Login

      public boolean Login(String email, String password) throws CouponSystemException
      Checks whether a user exists in the DB
      Specified by:
      Login in class ClientFacade
      Parameters:
      email - user's email
      password - user's password
      Returns:
      true if user exists, false if user doesn't exist or if the email + password combo are incorrect.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • GetCustomerCouponsByCategory

      public ArrayList<Coupon> GetCustomerCouponsByCategory(Category category) throws CouponSystemException
      Get all the coupons listed in DB for the logged on customer belonging to a specific category
      Parameters:
      category - - category of coupons to add to coupon list
      Returns:
      ArrayList if succeeded, null if no coupons matching category were found.

    • GetCustomerCouponsByPrice

      maxPrice - - maximum price of coupons to add to coupon list
